activities: Redline is a global online dynamic collaboration environment exclusively for licensed lawyers. Redline collects personal information that Redline members voluntarily provide, including account registration information, profile information, content, comments and other social signals or gestures on the platform, as well as various site usage and traffic data. The foregoing is not intended as an exhaustive description of Redline's information collection policies. Please refer to the Redline Privacy Policy for a comprehensive description.
